程序包 restuarantapp

类 Order

java.lang.Object
restuarantapp.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represent the order that the customers make. Contains all the information about the order
版本:
1.2
作者:
ZHANG MENGAO

  • 构造器概要

    Order​(Staff creator, int tableNumber, Customer customer, CalculateTax t, CalculateDiscount d)
    create a new order and initialize the necessary information and initialize the timeStamp to the current time

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Order

      public Order​(Staff creator, int tableNumber, Customer customer, CalculateTax t, CalculateDiscount d)
      create a new order and initialize the necessary information and initialize the timeStamp to the current time
      参数:
      creator - The employee object reference who created this order
      tableNumber - Table number that are allocated to this order
      customer - The customer object reference who made this order
      t - The calculate tax method to get the tax;
      d - The calculate discount method based on customer type

    • Order

      public Order​(int orderId, Staff creator, Customer customer, int tableNumber, Date timeStamp, CalculateTax t, CalculateDiscount d)
      Construct which contains all the attributes. Mainly used for recovering from storage or wants to specifying the time.
      参数:
      orderId - The order's id
      creator - The employee object reference who created this order
      customer - The customer object reference who made this order
      tableNumber - Table number that are allocated to this order
      timeStamp - The time when the order was created
      t - The calculate tax method to get the tax;
      d - The calculate discount method based on customer type

  • 方法详细资料

    • addOrderItem

      public boolean addOrderItem​(OrderItem item)
      add an order item to the order
      参数:
      item - The object reference for the orderItem that is going to be added.
      返回:
      an boolean value indicating whether adding is successful.

    • deleteOrderItem

      public boolean deleteOrderItem​(int index)
      delete Ordered item
      参数:
      index - the index of the item that you want to delete
      返回:
      an boolean value indicating whether deleting is successful.

    • printOrderDetail

      public void printOrderDetail()
      print all the detail of the order.

    • printOrderInvoice

      public String[] printOrderInvoice()
      Print the invoice of this order.
      返回:
      An array of string containing the information about the order invoice. returns null if the order contains no item.
